itemDescription: British soldier, recipient of the Military Cross

wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Blurton "Bob" Plant, MC (28 July 1915 – 18 April 2011) was an officer in the British Army who was awarded the Military Cross for his actions at Tufo in 1944, during the Battle of Monte Cassino.

response: *18 April – Bob Plant, World War II soldier (b. 1915)
*Bob Plant, 95, British soldier, recipient of the Military Cross.
